title: I would love to play league but its never going to download
body:
Hey i am new to League so new i have never played. I see others with this issue but haven't seen a fix. The program is installed and the patcher is running.
it is very very slow. around 100k at times. I have a new mac mini running up to date software. have tried all the network checking in the faq. I have checked to make sure user is admin. I have slower dsl so to elimated as issue took computer to two other locations one with cable one my work with fiber.

replies.body: I believe league is getting a new patcher and a new client in a few months. If you can't get it to work now, you should definetly try again by then.
I understand some time but i started the download almost 3 hours ago and i am at 4 percent at this rate it will take days

Thanks for the update!  Situations like this is usually due to a network problem maintaining a connection to the patching servers.  I suggest going over each step in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your connection.  Let me know if you have any questions!
i have went over it several times and have tried everything from it. and again i have tried 3 different locations all with completely different networks

Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will help you out individually.  You can also use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to download a set of logs which you can attach to the ticket for context.  We'll respond as soon as possible!

The patcher can certainly take some time to complete depending on the PC and network - the rate of download and writing files to the hard drive.  As long as you're not getting any errors, it's best to let it complete.  If you stopped it at any point, then the patcher would actually restart by scanning every file for corruption before resuming.  If you still have any issues let me know!
